description.p: Get information about a particular formInstanceId
You can specify the following inputs:
Detailed - returns both meta data and form data
Summary - returns only the form meta data
false - media fields values are the coded values actually stored in the TransForm database.
true - media field values are resolved to the actual URL for the media field.

argument.name: mode
argument.description: detailed/summary - determines if form meta data and data or just form meta data are returned

argument.name: resolveMediaFields
argument.description: determine if coded data for media fields is resolved to the actual URL on Amazon S3.

argument.name: injectFormMetaDataIntoData
argument.description: specifies if form meta data (i.e. name of user filling in form, form status, etc.) should be injected into the formdata return by the method.

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/GetFormDataForFormInstanceId/value_of_forminstanceid?mode=value%5fof%5fmode&resolveMediaFields=value%5fof%5fresolveMediaFields&injectFormMetaDataIntoData=value%5fof%5finjectFormMetaDataIntoData" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
